title: Im panicking now. Can't buy RP in new client
body: What with Elementalist Lux on her way, I'm srsly stressing out, because I'm unable to buy RP in the new client. Which means less money for you, and less Lux skin for me. PLEASE someone give me a fix for this. I need to be prepared.

replies.body: I have absolutely no idea why you'd stress out and panic over this. Unless it's a limited time skin, which it is not and it's not coming out soon, you shouldn't stress out so much for this.

Are you really suggesting that I, as a support Lux main, play any Lux games without the most fantasical super amazing mega awesome Lux skin/ward skin when it comes out? It's bad enough I have to wait right now, but that's just because it isn't released on live. I honestly don't think I could play Lux if I didn't have the skin the very second it came out. What kind of Lux main would I be.

@Final Spark Lux - what region are you logging on to? You should be able to purchase RP in the client (I'm looking at in now in NA). But if you could provide some more information I'd love to look into this for you.
I was indeed logging on from NA. I restarted everything and that seems to have fixed it. Not sure why it wouldn't work in the first place though.

Anyone else notice the post with the most riot response isn't one where people are lagging... or the game isn't working...

It's one where they ain't getting our money.

Or more likely they replied because I was having a problem with a feature that should be working which wasn't.  If you take the time to read through some threads, you'll notice the majority of them are all saying the SAME exact things, and there have been multiple responses to these threads from reds. They aren't going to take the time to respond to hundreds of threads that say the same thing when they're already working on that problem, and have stated such in another similar thread. They will however take the time to help when a new problem (like mine) crops up, regardless what it's about. It just so happened to be about buying RP, but that doesn't influence if they reply or not. Also, I hardly consider 1 (same question to one other person from the same red) reply to be "the most riot response"
